Key Match Events: Kevin De Bruyne scored the second goal for Belgium after a long kick from the goalkeeper
Youri Tielemans scored the first goal for Belgium in the second minute
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium needed to respond after losing to Slovakia in their opening game
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium's win helped them shake off the shock of an early exit in previous tournaments
The match outcome was crucial for Belgium's campaign in Euro 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: All four teams in Group E have three points, affecting the tournament standings
